attributes.name: Implement Cross-Component Drag and Drop System
attributes.details:
Design and implement a robust drag and drop system with the following specifications:

- Evaluate and integrate a suitable drag and drop library (e.g., react-dnd, dnd-kit, or sortablejs)
- Create reusable drag and drop hooks/utilities
- Implement drag source and drop target abstractions
- Add visual feedback during drag operations
- Handle drag preview with custom styling
- Implement drop validation logic
- Add support for touch devices
- Create comprehensive test suite for DnD interactions
- Document library integration and custom implementation details
